select borrowInfo.borrow_room_id, borrowInfo.borrow_room_name, borrowInfo.borrow_date, borrowInfo.borrow_time_id, borrowInfo.borrow_reason, borrowInfo.borrow_time_name, users.username, users.uClass, borrowInfo.borrow_user, borrowInfo.apply_time, borrowInfo.isNeedMedia

and borrow_date = #{arg0} and borrow_time_id = #{arg1} and borrow_reason = #{arg2} and borrow_room_id = #{arg3} and users.user_id = borrowInfo.borrow_user
